name: Sim Racing Dashboard
description:
Sim Racing Dashboard is a telemetry app for F1 2017 (PS4, Xbox one, PC).

This app features real-time vehicle telemetry of crucial vehicle data. Designed by a racing mechanical engineer for race car drivers it includes graphing of rpm, speed, gear, throttle and brake position per lap.

Get the advantage over your opposition by knowing exactly whats going on with your car at all times.

Want more? There is also a HUD and one of the most important things, a dedicated race page showing you critical fuel, tire (wear/temps/pressures), brake (temps), damage, a must have for any racer.

This app will work with both the PC and Console versions of F1 2017. Please enable UDP telemetry in game settings.

Here is the demo video of this application.
https://youtu.be/iPZfWggK5TA

Have fun!
